toto.filters.despike_phasespace3d¶

Removes spike noise from Acoustic Doppler

Velocimetry (ADV) data using phase-space method, using modified Goring and Nikora (2002) method by Nobuhito Mori (2005). Further modified by Joseph Ulanowski to remove offset in output (2014).

Parameters¶

input_arrayPanda Obj

The Panda dataframe.

Examples:¶

>>> df['phasespace3d']=despike_phasespace3d.despike_phasespace3d(df['signal'].copy())
>>>
toto.filters.despike_phasespace3d.despike_phasespace3d(input_array, args={})[source]¶
toto.filters.despike_phasespace3d.func_excludeoutlier_ellipsoid3d(xi, yi, zi, theta)[source]¶

% % This program excludes the points outside of ellipsoid in two- % dimensional domain
